attributes.action: Retain (in their present form) the Regimental Colours of the individual Battalions within the Royal Regiment of Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Discussion are ongoing in the Ministry of Defence to replace the present Regimental Colours carried by each Battalion (when on parade)within the Royal Regiment of Scotland with a standard Colour which will only show honours common to all the Battalions.The present Colours remind us of hard-won battles,of the Regimental family,and 400 years of service to our country. We have lost our individual dress,lets ensure we keep our Colour`s...
